item.title: TUCTF 2017 - Writeup
item.description: Reversing 200 (Unknown) Diberikan file ELF 64 bit stripped. Berikut hasil disassembly fungsi main signed __int64 __fastcall main(int a1, char **a2, char **a3) { signed __int64 result; // rax@2 unsigned int i; // [sp+14h] [bp-Ch]@5 char *v5; // [sp+18h] [bp-8h]@5 if ( a1 == 2 ) { if ( strlen(a2[1]) == 56 ) { v5 = a2[1]; for ( i = 0; i < 0x38; ++i ) { if ( (unsigned int)sub_401E90((__int64)v5, i) ) dword_603084 = 1; } if ( dword_603084 ) puts("Nope.
